src_original: baddhaśceccittamātaṃgaḥ smṛtirakṣā samantataḥ /  bhayamastaṃ gataṃ sarvaṃ sadā kalyāṇamāgatam //  vyāghrāḥ siṃhā gajā ṛkṣā sarve ca duṣṭaśatravaḥ /  sarve narakapālāśca ḍākinyo rākṣasāstathā //  sarve baddhā bhavantyete cittasyaikasya bandhanāt /  cittasyaikasya damanāt sarve dāntā bhavantyamī //
